title: Silent Night Sona and the Kog Maw variant of the skin don't sing anymore
body: I was just in a game with both skins, we tried to dance so that we would sing together and there was nothing but silence. I only got the kog skin so they could sing together and it appears neither of them work right now.

replies.body: Oh no, this is awful. D: Luckily, we're off season, but we'll see what we can do to get this resolved ASAP! Thanks for the report! ^-^

Thanks for checking that, A Cloud! :D No problem, occasionally these kinds of occurrences can just happen during random games too. I appreciate you checking this out and updating this thread! Let me know if you run into anymore problems, and I can look into it. :]

Hi there, A Cloud!

Just to be sure, are you using your dance emote or your **joke emote** to trigger this? You should be able to get the holiday duo to perform together if you use their jokes.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot LoveStrut,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=JaiTguRe,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-29T01:51:44.586+0000)
>
> Hi there, A Cloud!
> 
> Just to be sure, are you using your dance emote or your **joke emote** to trigger this? You should be able to get the holiday duo to perform together if you use their jokes.

I tried all of the emotes to no avail, may have just been that 1 game though. I haven't tried since to be completely honest.
Edit: After trying again it seems to work, may have just been a bug or something on my end, sorry for the false report.
Sometimes when I spam my joke or laugh, nothing happens, but I think (and I may be completely wrong) that it's just too many inputs at once.
